recipe.name: Lemon Ice Cream Pie
recipe.notes: There's some questionable text on this one and I'm nearly certain the glaze ingredients are supposed to go with the rest of this and that the "Celery & green pepper and lit..." that's mostly struck out is supposed to be perhaps ignored...
recipe.preparation: Mix & spread into 9 inch pie tin.  Soften one quart vanilla ice cream.  Add 6oz can frozen lemonade.  Mix + spread on crust.  Put in freezer while making glaze.Glaze: Dilute marmalade with lemon juice.
